notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This review was funded by the EU Third Health Programme (2014-2020) in the framework of the Specific Contract No 2017 72 06 implementing Framework contract No FWC CHAFEA/2015/Health/05 - LOT 3: Organisation of a training and production of training package on entry and exit screening was signed between CHAFEA and the consortium including: the University of Thessaly, Department of Hygiene and Epidemiology (Greece), the Robert Koch Institute, Department for Infectious Disease Epidemiology (Germany) and the National Institute for Public Health and the Environment, RIVM, (the Netherlands).
